item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Let me ask you something first. Do you want a regular vanilla relationship with no kinky fuckery at all?" My mouth drops open. "Kinky fuckery?" I squeak. "Kinky fuckery." "I can't believe you said that.' "Well, I did. Answer me," he says calmly. I flush. My inner goddess is down on bended knee with her hands clasped in supplication begging me. "I like your kinky fuckery," I whisper." -- E.L. James

item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Don’t leave me,” he whispers. “Oh, for crying out loud—no! I am not going to go!” I shout and it’s cathartic. There, I’ve said it. I am not leaving. “Really?” His eyes widen. “What can I do to make you understand I will not run? What can I say?” He gazes at me, revealing his fear and anguish again. He swallows. “There is one thing you can do.” “What?” I snap. “Marry me,” he whispers." -- E.L. James

item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Never trust a man who can dance." -- E.L. James

item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "You wanted hearts and flowers,” he murmurs. I blink at him, not quite believing what I’m seeing. “You have my heart.” And he waves toward the room. “And here are the flowers,” I whisper, completing his sentence. “Christian, it’s lovely." -- E.L. James

item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Miss Steele, I do believe you’re making my palm twitch." -- E.L. James

item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "We aim to please Miss Steele" -- E.L. James

item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "This quote – Tess says it to her mother after Alec D’Urberville has had his wicked way with her.” “I know,” muses Kate. “What is he trying to say?” “I don’t know, and I don’t care. I can’t accept these from him. I’ll send them back with an equally baffling quote from some obscure part of the book.” “The bit where Angel Clare says fuck off?” Kate asks with a completely straight face. “Yes, that bit." -- E.L. James

item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Why don't you like me ?" "Because you never stay with me." -- E.L. James

item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Don't get your panties in such a twist... and give me back mine." -- E.L. James

item.title: Natalyfrancis add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "You have to kiss a lot of frogs before you find your prince" -- E.L. James
